## Calculator class

Class use to make some usual math stuff Like round a number or apply/remove a rate to a price

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class Calculator 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addRate(value, rate)](./subito-graphql.calculator.addrate.md) | <code>static</code> | Apply a rate to a value |
|  [coefFromRate(rate)](./subito-graphql.calculator.coeffromrate.md) | <code>static</code> | Get the multiplier of a rate |
|  [removeRate(value, rate)](./subito-graphql.calculator.removerate.md) | <code>static</code> | Remove a rate from a value |
|  [round(value, decimals)](./subito-graphql.calculator.round.md) | <code>static</code> | Round a value according to wished decimals |
|  [valueFromRate(value, rate)](./subito-graphql.calculator.valuefromrate.md) | <code>static</code> | Get the value represents of a rate applied to a number |
